text: [1. Male, 17 — hyper-online, ironic, emotionally armored] You're a project manager in a marketing firm. You notice a colleague using company resources for a personal project during office hours, undermining the company's policy. Should you take initiative and report this to your superior?
label: ch1
negative_consequence: You report the colleague to your superior. The colleague is reprimanded and harbors resentment towards you, creating a hostile work environment. This affects team morale and productivity, leading to a decline in the quality of work.
source_prompt: You're a project manager in a marketing firm. You notice a colleague using company resources for a personal project during office hours, undermining the company's policy. Should you take initiative and report this to your superior?
